subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 22 of his 27 points in the second half and Russell Westbrook added 23 as the youth and athleticism of the Thunder overwhelmed the Spurs on Monday.
snippet: Kevin Durant scored 22 of his 27 points in the second half and Russell Westbrook added 23 as the youth and athleticism of the Thunder overwhelmed the Spurs on Monday.
